channel.title: Need Help
channel.description: [code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 20 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savegame(client.java:20438) at client.run(client.java:20241) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20 String index out of range: 20[/code] WTF does that mean. Anyone knows how to fix?

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Ultimate_Pkrs Ultimate Pkrs
item.description:
@Ultimate_Pkrs wrote:

Hm. I’ll Post Whole Code Sec.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

marcbob:

looks like client didnt connect to source or char files or something

You’re a god damn retard.

 at client.savegame(client.java:20438)
        at client.run(client.java:20241)

There’s a problem with some code at line 20438 & 20241 in client.java
OutOfBoundsExceptions usually have to do with arrays.
Post what’s there, and hopefully this should be easy to solve.

Read full topic
